title: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross proves she's well and truly over him as she smooches new man
text:
They were practically inseparable earlier this year.

But having split over the summer, Hana Cross and her ex Brooklyn Beckham seem to have very much moved on - with Hana seen packing on the PDA with a new man in Malibu on Tuesday.

Loitering around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu, 22-yearold Hana was seen smooching a man, while their pals watched on.

Over it! Hana Cross and her ex Brooklyn Beckham seem to have very much moved on - with Hana seen packing on the PDA with a new man in Malibu on Tuesday

New couple: They were both clad in casual ensembles for the outing - with Hana rocking a white crop top showcasing her lithe waist

The new couple were both clad in casual ensembles for the outing - with Hana rocking a white crop top showcasing her lithe waist.

Her new boyfriend gripped her close, as she flaunted her svelte frame in baggy black sweatpants and a matching beanie hat.

She wore her brunette locks sleekly around her shoulders, a hair tie around her wrist.

Her boyfriend wore all-black, including a backwards baseball cap and white sneakers.

PDA: Loitering around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu, 22-yearold Hana was seen smooching a man, while their pals watched on

Casual: She wore her brunette locks sleekly around her shoulders, a hair tie around her wrist

Dinner date: The pair were joined by several friends

Intense: Her new boyfriend gripped her close as they enjoyed a smooch

Lunch date: Her boyfriend wore all-black, including a backwards baseball cap and white sneakers

Low-key: She flaunted her svelte frame in baggy black sweatpants and a matching beanie hat

Got it, flaunt it? Hana showed off her trim frame as her male companion strolled along behind

Brooklyn, meanwhile, was spotted across town spending time with a mystery blonde girl at a mansion party in Beverly Hills, despite reportedly dating stunning brunette actress Phoebe Torrance, who is five years his senior.

The aspiring photographer dressed down in all-black ensemble while his pretty companion drew attention to herself by wearing an oversized yellow racing jacket, featuring distinctive markings.

The pair appeared to stay close together while the party broke up and their other friends dispersed.

Kiss kiss: Hana's pal couldn't keep his hands off her as they hung out outside

Cute: The pair larked around together as they headed to the parking lot

History: Hana dated Brooklyn, 20, for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting

Last month: Hana and Brooklyn risked an awkward run-in when they both showed up at the same exclusive event in London

Despite her oversized jacket, the platinum beauty put in a leggy appearance, with her attire beneath proving to be extremely short.

Her short locks were styled into a low twist tied at the nape of her neck, with some strands left to effortlessly frame her stunning visage.

She accessorised with gold hoop earrings and enhanced her beauty with a heavy layering of mascara and lipgloss on her full pout.

Brooklyn wrapped up warm for the night-time event, with a thick woolly hat atop his head.

Crossing paths: Brooklyn was seen making his way into the LOVE & YouTube Fashion Week party, held at The Standard, within minutes of Hana's arrival

Run-ins: Their recent night out at the same soirée came amid reports that Brooklyn kissed another of his exes, Lexy Panterra, while partying in the English capital

Clash: It was also recently reported that Hana was left in tears by Brooklyn, after the pair faced an awkward run-in at the Agent Provocateur AW19 campaign launch party

Drama: A source told The Sun that she was consoled by her friends following the tense encounter

Tears: Hana was later seen leaving the party five minutes after Brooklyn, upset

MailOnline has contacted Brooklyn's representatives for comment.

Hana dated Brooklyn, 20, for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting.

Last month they risked an awkward run-in when they both showed up at the same exclusive event in London.

Brooklyn was seen making his way into the LOVE & YouTube Fashion Week party, held at The Standard, within minutes of Hana's arrival.

Also out: Brooklyn, 20, was spotted spending time with a mystery blonde girl at a mansion party in Beverly Hills, LA, earlier this month

Mystery woman: His pretty companion drew attention to herself by wearing an oversized racing jacket, featuring distinctive markings

Low key: The aspiring photographer dressed down in all-black ensemble

Their night out at the same soirée came amid reports that Brooklyn kissed another of his exes, Lexy Panterra, while partying in the English capital.

It was also recently reported that Hana was left in tears by ex Brooklyn, after the pair faced an awkward run-in at the Agent Provocateur AW19 campaign launch party.

A source told The Sun that she was consoled by her friends following the tense encounter, and was later seen leaving the party five minutes after Brooklyn.

The source said: 'They were chatting together and it was very tense. By the end of it I could hear Brooklyn say, '"it is what it is".

'He walked off and she went back to her friends looking dejected, but she held it together while her pals comforted her.'

Leggy: Despite her oversized jacket, the platinum beauty put in a leggy appearance, with her attire beneath proving to be extremely short

Beauty: The unknown blonde accessorised with gold hoop earrings and enhanced her beauty with a heavy layering of mascara and lipgloss on her full pout

Side by side: The pair appeared to stay close together while the party broke up and their other friends dispersed

MailOnline contacted representatives for Brooklyn and Hana at the time.

There have also been reports that Brooklyn's new flame, Phoebe, 25, previously worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike.

Brooklyn is said to have enjoyed a string of dates with the stunning brunette and has reportedly been 'teased by his friends' over how similar his new girlfriend and his famous mother look.

Stunning: Brooklyn is said to have enjoyed a string of dates with actress Phoebe Torrance, 25, who is believed to have worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike in the past

Claims: According to reports, Brooklyn has been 'teased by his friends' over how similar Phoebe, pictured left, and his famous mother, pictured right, look

Moving on: Brooklyn and Hana were together for nine months [pictured in February]

A source told The Sun: 'Bizarrely though, from a certain angle she does look terrifyingly like his mother, Victoria.

'A few of his friends have teased him about it but Brooklyn is adamant that there is nothing "Oedipal" about it - or words to that effect.

'But Phoebe told pals that she actually did a few jobs as a Victoria lookalike in her early modelling days, the money of which helped fund her university course.

'Presumably she never thought she might one day meet her idol.'
description: Hana Cross and her ex Brooklyn Beckham seem to have very much moved on - with Hana seen packing on the PDA with a new man in Malibu on Tuesday.
